Finds Pets by status

GET
/pet/findByStatus

Parameters

Query Parameters

status
required
string

Status values that need to be considered for filter

Responses

200

Array<object>

Pet details

object
id
required

Pet ID

integer format: int64
>= 1
category
required

Group

object
id

Category ID

integer format: int64
>= 1
name

Category Name

string
name
required

Name

string
photoUrls
required

Image URL

Array<string>
tags
required

Tag

Array<object>
object
id

Tag ID

integer format: int64
>= 1
name

Tag Name

string
status
required

Pet Sales Status

string
Allowed values: available pending sold

400

object
